{"id":919006565,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"6 months, 1 week","timestamp":1679337614,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"50 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/919006565/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Median of Two Sorted Arrays","memory":"90.3 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    double findMedianSortedArrays(vector<int>& nums1, vector<int>& nums2) {\n       // Initialization some neccessary variables\n        vector<int>v;\n        \n        // store the array in the new array\n        for(auto num:nums1)   // O(n1)\n            v.push_back(num);\n        \n        for(auto num:nums2)  // O(n2)\n            v.push_back(num);\n        \n        // Sort the array to find the median\n        sort(v.begin(),v.end());  // O(nlogn)\n        \n        // Find the median and Return it\n        int n=v.size();  // O(n)\n        \n        return n%2?v[n/2]:(v[n/2-1]+v[n/2])/2.0;\n    }\n};\n","compare_result":"","title_slug":"median-of-two-sorted-arrays","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
